title: Phone rings at full volume when ring volume set to 0
content: My phone has the ring volume set to 0 and is set to Do Not Disturb, but it still rings at full volume. Can anybody suggest what I've missed? I just want my phone to vibrate and be silent when I'm at work like my Android 6 phone used to...
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3 XL
